items.summary:
As an AI, I'm here to help you interact with a fun and entertaining section of the internet - dad jokes! Here are some of the things you can ask me to do:

1. "Could you tell me a random dad joke?" - I can serve it to you as simple text or in a more structured format.
2. "Could you share a random dad joke suitable for Slack?" - Evidently, I have the ability to tailor my answer to fit different platforms, like Slack!
3. "Can I hear a specific dad joke if I give you its ID?" - Of course! Just give me the ID and I can provide you with the joke either as text or in a structured format.
4. "Could you help me find a selection of dad jokes?" - I can show you an array of dad jokes, either as simple text or in a json format.
5. "How about finding a dad joke with a specific theme or keyword?" - That's quite doable! Just tell me the term you wish to search for.

Just ask and enjoy the dad joke extravaganza!
